channel.title: Help how i can put bank both
channel.description: how i can put bank both and where to get code of it?

item.title: Help how i can put bank both
item.dc:creator: @suikodenscape suikodenscape
item.description:
@suikodenscape wrote:

Go into your “client.java” file and press ctrl + F. Search for something along of makeglobal there should be a huge list of make global objects. add this int with them

           makeGlobalObject(3214, 3417, 2213, 1, 10);//bank at shop

This is the absX coord Change it to your “X” positoion
This is absY Coord cange it to your “Y” position
This is the bank booth object ID. (leave it as is)
And this is the direction it is in. (-2, -1, 1, 2, are all the different directions)

Read full topic
item.source: Help how i can put bank both
